\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & Y && {\mathrm{Cone}(f)} && {\Sigma X} \\
	M & N && {\mathrm{Cone}(u)} && {\Sigma M}
	\arrow["f", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha }"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\boxed K}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\binom 01}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["\beta", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{(1 \ 0)}", from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow["\gamma"', dashed, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\Sigma \alpha }", from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["u"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\binom 01}"', from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{(1 \ 0)}"', from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=0, to=2]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1, to=3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
